text.div:
Covid19CaseReporting

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://openhie.org/fhir/covid19-casereporting/ImplementationGuide/openhie.fhir.covid

COVID19 Case Reporting

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology

resource.name: Immunization Tracking
resource.description: Administer a suitable vaccine based on the most recent lab result

resource.name: Treatment Dispensed or Prescribed
resource.description: A list of all possible drugs

resource.name: Test Types
resource.description: A list of COVID19 test types

resource.name: Encounter
resource.description: A record of the individual's visit at the organization

resource.name: Death
resource.description: An event assoicated with the death of an individual who has been diagnosed with COVID19

resource.name: Practitioner
resource.description: The healthcare professional who has been assigned to a given lab task

resource.name: Lab Task
resource.description: Assists with tracking the state of the lab order and its completion status

resource.name: Patient
resource.description: The individual receiving COVID19 services

resource.name: Date of next vaccination
resource.description: When must the individual return to the organization for the next scheduled vaccination?

resource.name: Diagnosis
resource.description: Confirmation of the diagnosis

resource.name: Admission Types
resource.description: A list of admission types

resource.name: Source of Information
resource.description: Custom code system to support the need to report on the origin of the individual's COVID19 diagnosis

resource.name: Lab Result Task Output
resource.description: Custom code system to support the need to indicate that a COVID19 result was documeneted by the lab

resource.name: Lab Order Request Location
resource.description: What is the location of the organization responsible for conducting the examination of the individual's sample?

resource.name: Diagnostic Report
resource.description: A report as a result of the lab task being completed

resource.name: Presenting symptoms
resource.description: A list of symptoms

resource.name: Date Last Hospitalised
resource.description: When last was the individual admitted to hospital?

resource.name: Immunization Tracking
resource.description: Retrospectively capture COVID19 immunization data for vaccines administered at other organizations

resource.name: Lab Result Task Output
resource.description: Custom code system to support the need to indicate that a COVID19 result was documeneted by the lab

resource.name: Reason for Assessment or Test Not Performed
resource.description: A list of reasons associated with the service request for the lab order

resource.name: Treatment dispensed or prescribed
resource.description: To indicate whether Paxlovid has been issued to the individual

resource.name: Cancellation Reasons
resource.description: A list of reasons as a result of the lab task being cancelled

resource.name: Conditions / Comorbidity
resource.description: List of conditions and comorbidities

resource.name: Conditions or Comorbidities Present
resource.description: Does the individual have any known pre-existing conditions and/or comorbidities?

resource.name: Test Result
resource.description: COVID19 diagnosis

resource.name: Lab Order
resource.description: A service request that initiates the need for the lab to collect the test sample

resource.name: Vaccine Dose Ever Received
resource.description: Has the individual received at least one shot of the vaccine at any point in time in the past?

resource.name: Admission Location
resource.description: What is the location of the organization where the patient is currently being admitted to for treatment?

resource.name: Lab Results
resource.description: The result of the lab test which determines whether the patient is infected with COVID19 or not

resource.name: Recovered Or Symptoms Resolved
resource.description: Has the individual fully recovered from symptoms associated with COVID19?

resource.name: Source of Information
resource.description: Custom code system to support the need to report on the origin of the individual's COVID19 diagnosis

resource.name: Conditions or Comorbidity
resource.description: What pre-existing conditions and/or comorbidities exist for the individual?

resource.name: Organization
resource.description: Administering Organization

resource.name: Ever Hospitalized
resource.description: Has the individual been admitted to hospital at any point in time in the past?

resource.name: Presentation
resource.description: Determine if the COVID19 positive individual has any noticeable symptoms

resource.name: Specimen Type
resource.description: The type of specimen sample that was collected by the lab

resource.name: Yes No Unknown
resource.description: A list of options used to provide an answer

resource.name: Long Covid / Post-Covid
resource.description: Does the indiviual continue to suffer from COVID19 health problems that are new, returning or ongoing conditons?

resource.name: Vaccine Types
resource.description: A list of COVID19 manufacturers

resource.name: Presenting Symptoms
resource.description: Existing symptoms which may help with diagnosis

resource.name: Specimen
resource.description: The test sample that was collected for the initiated lab order
